meanings.definition: The quality or state of being red.
meanings.sent1: Her cheeks showed a bright redness after running in the sun.
meanings.sent2: The redness of the apple made it stand out among the green fruits.
meanings.sent3: The redness of the traffic light made the cars stop in unison.
meanings.sent4: The redness of the sunset painted the sky in fiery hues.
meanings.sent5: The redness of the rose petals was a striking contrast against the green leaves.

meanings.sent1: The artist mixed different shades to create the perfect redness for the painting.
meanings.sent2: The redness of the fabric made it ideal for the holiday decorations.
meanings.sent3: The clown's exaggerated redness on his nose made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The redness of the fire truck made it easily visible in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The redness of the lipstick added a bold touch to her makeup.
